availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Asa Elliott (Cumberland County, Kentucky, resident, miller, and farmer)

body.p: Cumberland County, Kentucky, miller and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Robert Elliott and Sally Elliott. Married to Nancy Jane Simpson Elliott in Adair County, Kentucky, on January 31, 1854. Father of Owen Elliott, Jalappa Elliot, Robert Elliott, William Elliott, and Richard Elliott. Resident of Cumberland County in 1850. Household owned twenty-two enslaved persons in Cumberland County in 1850. Miller in Cumberland County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Cumberland County in 1860. Farmer in Cumberland County, Kentucky, in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Cumberland, p. 319A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Cumberland.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, District 1, p. 364A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Elliott, p. 53B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Adair County Marriages, Film 000216815.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Cumberland County, KY, February 1864.
